text: Voodoo Island is a 1957 American horror thriller movie directed by Reginald Le Borg and starring Boris Karloff, Beverly Tyler, Murvyn Vye, Elisha Cook Jr., Rhodes Reason, Jean Engstrom, Adam West. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 horror movies Category:1957 thriller movies Category:American horror movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Reginald Le Borg Category:Movies set in Hawaii
title: Voodoo Island
